item.title: Mentioned by Wall Street Journal (press release)
item.description:
Media Advisory: Minister Ritz to Make Important Announcement Regarding ...
Minister Ritz will be joined by Parliamentary Secretary Pierre Lemieux, Member of Parliament LaVar Payne, and officials from the Canadian Food Inspection Agency, Health Canada and the Public Health Agency of Canada. Event: Announcement.
